definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 這邊|这边[zhe4 bian1]

sentences.english: Look at these coasters over here.
Come here. Let me show you some.
sentences.chinese: 到这边来，我拿几条给你看看。

sentences.english: Gold disappeared betweenher legs and the nurses gathered around her head.
sentences.chinese: 金医生坐在她的两腿那边，护士们则站在她的头这边。

sentences.english: Here, you have two variables of integration.
sentences.chinese: 这边需要对两个变量做积分。

sentences.english: His mommy was headed toward the clothesline with a basket of wet clothes.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈提着一篮子湿衣服，朝晾衣绳这边走来。

sentences.english: Brad and I fixed our side of the house up.
sentences.chinese: 布莱德将我俩住的这边修整了一番。

sentences.english: Ifthe threat is from the side, the fly leans the other way before takeoff.
sentences.chinese: 借使威胁来自这边，苍蝇起飞前会倾向另一侧。

sentences.english: Come into the dark room here, and let us have one final word alone.
sentences.chinese: 到这边这个黑屋子里来吧，我俩单独谈谈。

sentences.english: But not heavy enough to let me fly.
sentences.chinese: 但是这边的风真的大得够爽。

sentences.english: I guess they had heard me yelling. My mom hadn’t made a sound.
sentences.chinese: 有人听到我的声音，朝这边走了过来，妈妈一声不发。

sentences.english: History is always at the side of P. R. China.
sentences.chinese: 历史永远是站在中国这边的。

sentences.english: Neibour's tree is growing over the wall on my side.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁家的树从墙上长到我这边来了。

sentences.english: Go this side please . No pushing away.
The railings on this side have just been whitewashed and can fade easily.
sentences.chinese: 这边的扶手才刚粉刷过，很容易掉色。

sentences.english: I happened to see a Shanghai Dazhong service station over here.
sentences.chinese: 我看这边正好有上海大众的维修站。

sentences.english: Hensley glanced in Jack's direction, spied Bauer's legs sticking out of a pile of wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 汉斯莱望向杰克这边，在一堆残骸间发现了他的双腿。

definition: (sitting) opposite/across (the street)/directly in front/to be face to face
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
to come up/to approach/(verb complement indicating success)
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
